<jobs>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Substitute Teacher]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
9th Bridge is a bold co-creation and collaboration born of the Downtown Project. We?re on a journey to redefine the experience of school, and it?s one that learners, teachers, families and the Las Vegas community will embark on together. Located in the heart of Downtown Las Vegas, we have opened in a beautifully renovated historical building, which has been transformed into a learning environment that powers the educational experience we envision.  We offer a unique approach for educating children based on neuroscience and social-emotional learning, with a focus on creativity and entrepreneurship. 9th Bridge is home to families of children 6 weeks old through 3rd grade for the 2017-2018 school year.  We invite you to begin your journey at 9th Bridge.
  
 
  
The 9th Bridge School is seeking Substitute Teachers. Members of our Substitute Teaching Staff will work on an as needed basis to assist our teaching staff in maintaining a structured classroom. The substitute will be responsible for aiding the teacher in the implementation of the daily schedule and routine, leading activities, and ensuring safety and security of students through proper supervision.
  
 
  
Candidates must have or be able to obtain the following: a Background Check and?Sherriff card, Proof of TB test results, and must also be willing to?obtain trainings as required by our licensing agency.
  
 
  
Education Requirement:  CDA /Associates Degree in Early Childhood Education or a related field
  
 
  
Experience: Minimum of 2 years experience working in a preschool setting,? NAEYC accredited preferred. Excellent references and working history.

    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Support Staff]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
9th Bridge is a bold co-creation and collaboration born of the Downtown Project. We?re on a journey to redefine the experience of school, and it?s one that learners, teachers, families and the Las Vegas community will embark on together. Located in the heart of Downtown Las Vegas, we have opened in a beautifully renovated historical building, which has been transformed into a learning environment that powers the educational experience we envision.  9th Bridge is home to families of children 12 months old through 5th grade for the 2020-2021 school year.  We invite you to begin your journey at 9th Bridge.
  

  
The 9th Bridge School is currently seeking Support Staff.  
  

  
 The Support Staff will  provide overall assistance in supporting teachers and children in an  early childhood environment, including but not limited to, before-care  and after-care programming, playground supervision, classroom management,  pick-up and drop-off support, lunch duty, organizing and facilitating  specials, supervising napping children, assisting in lesson plan  development, and designing age-appropriate activities. 
  

  
Interest in facilitating specials ie. Art, Music, PE and Foreign Language preferred.
  

  
 Must have or be able to obtain the following: a Background Check and  Sheriff card, Proof of TB test results, and must also be willing to  obtain training as required by our licensing agency. 
  

  
Education Requirement:  Associates Degree in a related field or a CDA as well as a desire to pursue advanced education.
  

  
Experience: Minimum of 2 years of experience working in a preschool setting,NAEYC accredited preferred. Excellent references and working history.

    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Extended Care Teacher - Floater]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
9th Bridge School is a project-based early childhood and elementary school centrally located in Downtown Las Vegas.  The 9th Bridge School Educational Model is built upon the foundation of Social - Emotional Learning, Critical Thinking, and Integrated Academic Skills. At its core, it is our belief that learning should be student-inspired, inquiry-driven and experiential. Therefore, we use a project-based approach to learning, which means that our teachers are constantly observing and documenting the questions and interests of our students to develop authentic, engaging projects.
  

  
The 9th Bridge School is seeking to fill our Extended Care Teacher - Floater role. This teacher will? provide care during our after-care program and provide floater support during the day. Responsibilities include playground supervision, classroom management, communication with families, designing and facilitating ?engaging age-appropriate activities, substitute teaching, etc. 
  

  
Candidates must have or be able to obtain the following: a Background Check and? Sherriff card, Proof of TB test results, and must also be willing to? obtain training as required by our licensing agency.
  

  
Education Requirement:  Associates Degree in Early Childhood Education or a related field or a CDA as well as a desire to pursue advanced education.
  

  
Experience: Minimum of 1 year experience working in a preschool setting,?NAEYC accredited preferred. Excellent references and working history.
